title: "Be the friend you want to see in the world."
description:
Youngil's big idea deals with the importance of friends. He hopes his audience realizes that your life will be affected depending on who your friends are, not by how many friends you have.
Sometimes, people wait for someone who takes actions first before committing to a friendship. As a result, this influences social and ethical responsibilities of friends so that we may all achieve great success in life, alongside the friendships that count.
author: Youngil Seo
